questions: What’s the first memory you have of me?

Would you rather have spaghetti for hair or sweat maple syrup?
Would you rather grow a new tooth every time you laugh or sneeze confetti?
Would you rather have fingers as long as your legs or legs as short as your fingers?
Would you rather taste everything like chocolate or smell everything like gasoline?
Would you rather hiccup bubbles or burp glitter?
Would you rather have a tail that can’t hold anything or a trunk that can’t pick anything up?
Would you rather sneeze out a live frog every hour or cough up a goldfish once a day?
Would you rather have a belly button that dispenses ketchup or elbows that shoot out whipped cream?
Would you rather have a third arm that’s useless or a second head that won’t stop arguing with you?
Would you rather shed your skin like a snake once a month or molt feathers like a bird every week?
Would you rather be able to fly but only 2 inches off the ground or teleport but only into public restrooms?
Would you rather read minds but only of squirrels or talk to fish but they’re all sarcastic?
Would you rather be invisible but only when no one’s looking or super strong but only when lifting feathers?
Would you rather have X-ray vision but only see through cardboard or time travel but only to last Tuesday?
Would you rather breathe underwater but only in puddles or walk through walls but get stuck halfway every time?
Would you rather have a personal theme song that plays loudly everywhere you go or a spotlight that follows you in darkness?
Would you rather shrink to the size of a grape but weigh as much as a car or grow to the size of a giraffe but weigh as much as a pillow?
Would you rather control fire but only in your own mouth or control ice but only in your socks?
Would you rather be able to clone yourself but the clones hate you or summon a genie who only grants prank wishes?
Would you rather turn anything you touch into cheese or everything you eat taste like toothpaste?
Would you rather drink a smoothie made from random objects in your room or eat a sandwich assembled by a raccoon?
Would you rather only eat food that’s been licked by a cat or only drink liquids that have had a shoe dipped in them?
Would you rather have your favorite food taste rotten or your least favorite food taste amazing?
Would you rather have all drinks served at boiling temperature or freezing temperature forever?
Would you rather have food always slightly too salty or always slightly undercooked?
Would you rather eat a pizza made of dessert ingredients or a cake made of savory ingredients?
Would you rather have your food always move away when you try to eat it or have your utensils turn to jelly when you grab them?
Would you rather only be able to eat with a fork the size of a shovel or a spoon the size of a thimble?
Would you rather have every meal served on a flaming plate or a plate that’s vibrating violently?
Would you rather eat a burger made of literal dirty socks or a hot dog made of pencil erasers?
Would you rather have a pet elephant the size of a hamster or a hamster the size of an elephant?
Would you rather fight a duck-sized Tyrannosaurus rex or a Tyrannosaurus rex-sized duck?
Would you rather have all birds sound like car alarms or all dogs meow like cats?
Would you rather live in a world where trees walk around slowly or clouds scream when it rains?
Would you rather have to high-five every dog you see or apologize to every plant you pass?
Would you rather be chased by a slow, indestructible snail every day or a fast, harmless lion once a year?
Would you rather have to ride a unicycle everywhere or walk on all fours like a gorilla?
Would you rather have all your clothes made of spiderwebs or all your shoes made of jelly?
Would you rather live in a house made of candy that attracts ants or a house made of soap that’s always slippery?
Would you rather communicate only in whale sounds or only in dolphin clicks?
Would you rather have every door you open lead to the wrong room or every chair you sit on collapse?
Would you rather have your phone battery always at 1% but never die or always at 100% but randomly shuts off?
Would you rather have to wear socks on your hands or gloves on your feet forever?
Would you rather only be able to walk backward or only speak in rhymes?
Would you rather have your shadow move independently and mock you or your reflection always look disappointed?
Would you rather have all your clothes two sizes too big or one size too small forever?
Would you rather sneeze every time you say your own name or hiccup every time someone says your name?
Would you rather have to yell everything you say or whisper everything you say?
Would you rather trip over nothing every third step or bump into invisible walls daily?
Would you rather always have wet socks or a tiny rock in your shoe you can’t remove?
Would you rather live in a world where everyone has a clone that hates them or a world where everyone shares one brain cell?
Would you rather have a dragon that’s terrified of you or a unicorn that’s constantly judging you?
Would you rather be a vampire allergic to blood or a werewolf allergic to fur?
Would you rather live in a haunted house where ghosts rearrange your furniture nightly or a house where objects come to life and gossip about you?
Would you rather travel to space but only eat astronaut ice cream forever or live underwater but only breathe through a bendy straw?
Would you rather have a magic wand that only works on inanimate objects or a spellbook where all the spells are in a language you don’t know?
Would you rather be a mermaid with legs but no gills or a fish with arms but no fins?
Would you rather live in a video game with terrible glitches or a movie with awful plot holes?
Would you rather be friends with a talking potato or enemies with a sentient toaster?
Would you rather have a pet alien that constantly pranks you or a robot servant that mishears every command?
Would you rather relive the same hour forever or skip ahead randomly in time without control?
Would you rather know the exact date of your death but not how or know how you’ll die but not when?
Would you rather wake up with a new random accent every day or speak in reverse every Tuesday?
Would you rather live in a world where gravity switches direction randomly or where colors shift every hour?
Would you rather have everything you draw come to life but poorly or everything you write happen but with typos?
Would you rather be stuck in a time loop of your worst day or live forward but everyone else is in a loop?
Would you rather age backward but keep your memories or stop aging but forget everything every decade?
Would you rather have your dreams come true but in the worst way possible or never dream again?
Would you rather be able to pause time but you age double during pauses or slow time but everything sounds distorted?
Would you rather live in a world where everyone whispers or where everyone shouts?
Would you rather be a billionaire but only in Monopoly money or a millionaire but only in pennies?
Would you rather find a $100 bill every day but it’s always soggy or a $20 bill every week but it’s glued to the ground?
Would you rather have unlimited money but everything you buy is slightly broken or a normal salary but everything you own is gold-plated?
Would you rather get paid $1,000 every time you stub your toe or $10,000 every time you accidentally insult someone?
Would you rather be paid in cheese or in socks for the rest of your life?
Would you rather have a wallet that’s always empty but magically pays for things or a wallet that’s always full but everything costs 10x more?
Would you rather be rich but smell like raw onions or poor but smell like fresh cookies?
Would you rather inherit a castle infested with bats or a yacht haunted by seagulls?
Would you rather win the lottery but have to spend it all in one day or earn minimum wage but never have to pay for anything?
Would you rather have a money tree that grows $1 bills or a fountain that spits out diamonds but only at 3 AM?
Would you rather marry a sentient slice of bread or a sentient light bulb?
Would you rather have a partner who only communicates in interpretive dance or in puns?
Would you rather go on a date with a ghost who’s bad at being dead or a robot who’s bad at being a robot?
Would you rather have a love letter delivered by a screaming goat or a singing moose?
Would you rather have everyone you meet instantly adore you but also mimic your every move or have everyone instantly dislike you but leave you alone?
Would you rather have a romantic partner who’s perfect but invisible or visible but constantly embarrassing?
Would you rather be proposed to by a skywriter or by a parade of clowns?
Would you rather have a partner who’s always 10 minutes late or always 2 hours early?
Would you rather have a relationship counselor who’s a mime or a ventriloquist dummy?
Would you rather break up via carrier pigeon or message in a bottle?
Would you rather know all the answers but never be believed or be believed but never know the answers?
